description: Try our easy to follow Easy prawn pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy prawn pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add prawns and cook for 2 minutes or until prawns are pink and cooked through. Add pasta to pan. Season with salt and pepper, then toss to coat. Serve topped with feta and extra oregano leaves.
